definition: Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]

pinyin: Li2 man4 Luo2 he4 ding4 li3

sentences.english: The dynamic problem of constrained multibody systems in Riemannian configuration space is researched.
sentences.chinese: 在黎曼位形空間中研究了約束多體系統的動力學問題。

sentences.english: It will also be capable of evaluating definite integrals and Riemann sums.
sentences.chinese: 同時，它還可處理定積分和黎曼積分。

sentences.english: Pseudo-Riemannian Lie algebras in dimension 4 are classified.
sentences.chinese: 給出了四維僞黎曼李代數的分類。

sentences.english: In this paper, the nature of Riemann function summary.
sentences.chinese: 本文對黎曼函數的性質做歸納總結。

sentences.english: These two airfoils lie on different Riemann sheets in the hodograph plane.
sentences.chinese: 該兩個翼型處在不同的黎曼面內。

sentences.english: The generalized Riemann problem for a class of decoupled nonlinear hyperbolic system of conservation laws is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究一類解耦非線性雙曲守恆律系統的廣義黎曼問題。

sentences.english: Research of the group of motions in Riemann manifold is an important question of the differential geometry.
sentences.chinese: 黎曼流形運動羣的研究是微分幾何中一個重要問題。

sentences.english: In this paper the definition of Riemann integral haus been given by using the limit of many-valued function.
sentences.chinese: 本文試圖用多值函數的極限說明黎曼積分的定義。

sentences.english: These results are in agreement with those obtained by general relativity expressed in Riemannian geometry and that from practical observations.
sentences.chinese: 結果與用黎曼幾何表述的廣義相對論和實際觀測相符。

sentences.english: These results are in agreement with those obtained by general relativity expressed in Riemannian geometry a…
sentences.chinese: 結果與用黎曼幾何表述的廣義相對論和實際觀測相符。

sentences.english: So, do not cry, there is healthy life without the Riemann hypothesis.
sentences.chinese: 所以，不要哭，沒有黎曼假設依然能夠有健康的生活。

sentences.english: This article discusses the analyzing nature of Dirichlet function and Riemann function .
sentences.chinese: 黎曼函數在數學分析的學習中佔有舉足輕重的地位。

sentences.english: Let M be a compact and connected Riemannian manifold.
sentences.chinese: 設M是緊緻連通的黎曼流形。

sentences.english: J. Cheeger, Comparison Theorems in Riemannian Geometry, North-Holland publishing company.
sentences.chinese: 伍鴻熙等著，《黎曼幾何選講》，北京大學出版社。

sentences.english: This sharpens Hua's result and is as good as what was previously derived from the Generalized Riemann Hypothesis(GRH).
sentences.chinese: 這一結果與先前在廣義黎曼猜想下得到的結果一樣強。

sentences.english: Positive curvature has been a frequent subject in Riemannian geometry.
sentences.chinese: 曲率是黎曼幾何中的熱門研究課題。

definition: Cantor (name)/Georg Cantor (1845-1918), German mathematician, founder of set theory 集合論|集合论[ji2 he2 lun4]
Henri Poincaré (1854-1912), French mathematician, physician and philosopher

definition: variant of 費瑪|费玛[Fei4 ma3]
